title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form 10-17 - Motion for order approving relative as foster parent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form 10-17 - Motion for order approving relative as foster parent

State Regulations
F.C.A. ยง 1028-a Form 10-17
(Motion for Order Approving

Relative as Foster Parent)
(9/2006)
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of Docket No. CIN #
A Child Under the Age of 18

Alleged to be Abused Neglected by MOTION
FOR AN ORDER
APPROVING RELATIVE
AS FOSTER PARENT
________ Respondent(s)________
TO: PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that upon the annexed
affidavit of [specify]: sworn to on the day of and upon all prior
proceedings, a motion will be made at this Court at [specify address]: on [specify date]:, or as soon thereafter
as the parties and counsel can be heard for an Order, pursuant to Section
1028-a
of
the Family Court Act, transferring the above-named child(ren), who (is)(are) in
foster care, to reside with the affiant as a foster parent, directing the
commissioner of social services to commence an investigation of the affiant's
home within 24 hours and thereafter expedite approval or certification of the
affiant, if qualified, as a foster parent. Dated: Yours, etc. ______________
Affiant
______________
Print or type name
______________
Signature of Attorney, if any
______________
Attorney's Name (Print or Type)
______________
______________
______________
Attorney's Address and Telephone

Number

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective

Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form
10-17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
